channel.title: [repost]PoompScape V4[/repost]
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]THIS IS A REPOST OF THE CURRENT POOMPSCAPE V4[/size]
Ok guys if you think the server fails then that's ok it's your pov cuse b4 on my other servers i was in a mood about my old school etc lol anyways here's the server
I have changed loads of things in the Preview because u said nothing was changed well stuff has and stuff haven't lol
The New client looks really good and all that with the NEW NEW Right click thing which i will show u in a mo
Anyways Here are some pics that i have done
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/1171/homefwz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/4890/trainy.jpg[/img] The New right click thing [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/8469/newrightclick.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6250/shopsg.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/6940/barrowsshop.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6664/meleshop.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/3095/skillss.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/8375/tourny.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/7121/newpk1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/9599/kbdy.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/4759/gsminio.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/8325/deathzone.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/9599/kbdy.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/7043/partyarea.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/9862/teampk.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2254/newgodwars.jpg[/img]
New costom items [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6681/newcostomes.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/135/barrowsh.jpg[/img]
There the Pics now for the Vids
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2m78cqo/3]Poompscape PVP WORLD 2[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/302w1f7/3]Mining[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/aw9b2t/3]Use item on furnces[/URL]
if you want to edit the costs go onto client.java and searh for ultimate
Then all the codes will be there
Links:
Server: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=FVL155IL]Download through Megaupload[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?nl2njyznyy2]Download through Mediafire[/url]
Client: [url=http://uppit.com/v/JTA0J87T]Uppit Download[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?jqmnwyton5m]Mediafire[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=MSI4TXU0]Megaupload[/url]
Note: the World 2 is port 5555 and the ip's are set to my server so go into egui.Java and change to what ever you want to be. Note: Im not advertising because i do not have the ip now[/center]
[center]i cba with credits cuse i know you will just say 99.9 credits to bla and .1 to me so there's no point
[size=30pt]Plz post on what ever you think of the server PLZ to keep the post alive[/size][/center]
